body:
Reported by jazevec:

Chimeric Mass - I was unable to block it. Unless I'm blind the card text doesn't mention flying or anything.
author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)
title: Chimeric Mass can't be blocked

comments.body: I can not reproduce this. I was able to block Chimeric Mass without any problems in the few test games I did.
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)
